articles.title: Suryakumar Yadav etches his name in history books on Test debut, becomes first Indian to create unique record - Times Now
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav etched his name in history books and created a unique record on day 1 of the first Test match against Australia. Suryakumar was picked over Shubman Gill for a place in the playing XI. KS Bharat was India's second debutant in the fixture. Aust…
